abilities.name: V Transformation
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, you may choose a Basic Pokémon V from your discard pile and switch it with this Pokémon. Any attached cards, damage counters, Special Conditions, turns in play, and any other effects remain on the new Pokémon.

attacks.name: Stick On
attacks.effect: Attach a basic Energy card from your discard pile to this Pokémon.
